title: Travelers
description: Travelers from our future return to our time to try to correct the terrible problems that face humanity in their own time.

title: Protocol 6
description: The team's first mission goes terribly wrong when a fatal mistake leaves them holding a ticking time bomb.

title: Aleksander
description: One of the travelers struggles with being unable to stop future events.

title: Hall
description: The team meets another team and faces with a conflict.

title: Room 101
description: Marcy, Carly, Trever and Philip are abducted and interrogated by an unseen captor.

title: Helios 685
description: The Travelers try to fulfill their main mission and protect the world from a destructive disaster.

title: Protocol 5
description: The travelers are not sure they've fulfilled their mission because they are still in the 21st century. Now they are facing an unexpected problem: the anxiety of being trapped in someone else's life.

title: Donner
description: The Travelers face multiple complications in their professional life and their personal ones.

title: Bishop
description: MacLaren is kept on a tight leash after the Director orders an assassination. The other team members assemble after learning their leader is in grave danger.

title: Kathryn
description: The team tries to save Grant as Forbes and Kathryn search for him.

title: Marcy
description: Trevor tries to save his teacher, while the rest of the team try to save Marcy.

title: Grace
description: A murderous traveler arrives at the present and reveals the truth about a disquieting division between belligerent factions that is occurring in the future.

title: Ave Machina
description: Grant MacLaren and his team find themselves in FBI custody with no means of escape, while a mysterious new traveler reveals secrets to his psychiatrist.

title: Protocol 4
description: Philip makes an unexpected connection, Marcy helps David cope with his trauma, and MacLaren discovers a shocking truth that Kathryn has been hiding from him.

title: Jacob
description: After tracking down a missing traveler, the team is led to some disturbing answers about their kidnapping.
MacLaren and the team must help a fellow traveler plan his own assassination, while helping an unsuspecting activist complete a deadly mission.

title: Jenny
description: A deadly epidemic affects traveler teams around the world.

title: U235
description: With the unknown virus rapidly spreading, the team is left with only one option in order to save The Director hundreds of years in the future.

title: 17 Minutes
description: When the 3468's team fails the mission of rescuing the essential technology for the future, the Director sent Travelers after Travelers in order to assist the team and complete the mission, putting on motion the Protocol Alpha.

title: Traveler 0027
description: After receiving an unusual message to attend a court proceeding, the travelers find that one of their own is on trial for conspiring against The Director and interrupting the Grand Plan.

title: Update
description: Philip's timeline gets an update with some undesired side effects; Trevor makes a disturbing discovery about his host's past; MacLaren deals with the return of a traveler he thought had gone away for good.

title: 21C
description: Marcy attempts a procedure to recover her memories and more than she bargained for. The Travelers protect a little girl who is very important to the future. The MacLarens continue to mourn the passing of their unborn child.

title: Simon
description: The past of Simon and Vincent Ingram.
In an evasive effort to protect himself and his son, Traveler 001 puts a plan into play that threatens to expose the Travelers.
